questions:
What is the photo mainly about?
A) A scenic landscape
B) An outdoor event
C) A family gathering
D) A dark color drink placed on a wooden railing like structure surrounded by sandy area

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A person
B) A tree
C) A dark color drink on a wooden blue railing
D) A signpost

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) A blue railing with a drink on it
B) A sandy path
C) A person walking
D) A flower bed

What is in the background of the photo?
A) Mountains
B) The ocean
C) A fence like structure, Trees and people
D) Buildings

What is the drink in the cup likely to be?
A) Water
B) Juice
C) Beer or a dark beverage
D) Soda

What color is the railing in the photo?
A) Red
B) Blue
C) Green
D) Yellow

What is the condition of the ground in the photo?
A) Wet and muddy
B) Sandy and dry
C) Covered in grass
D) Paved with stones

What can be seen in the distance?
A) Water bodies
B) Mountains
C) People and structures
D) Vehicles

What is the color of the drink in the cup?
A) Clear
B) Light yellow
C) Dark, possibly black or brown
D) Red

What is the primary material of the railing?
A) Metal
B) Wood
C) Plastic
D) Stone

What type of cup is used for the drink?
A) Glass
B) Ceramic
C) Plastic
D) Metal

What is the main color theme of the structures in the background?
A) Black and white
B) Red, yellow and blue
C) Green and yellow
D) Brown and orange

What kind of trees are in the background?
A) Palm trees
B) Pine trees
C) Deciduous trees
D) No trees

What is the primary focus of the photo?
A) The drink on the railing
B) The people in the background
C) The structures in the background
D) The ground

What is the texture of the ground?
A) Smooth and paved
B) Rough and rocky
C) Sandy and uneven
D) Covered in grass

What is the most prominent feature in the foreground?
A) The drink
B) The ground
C) The people
D) The trees

What is the likely texture of the drink in the cup?
A) Fizzy
B) Smooth and creamy
C) Watery
D) Icy

What is the likely texture of the railing?
A) Smooth and polished
B) Rough and painted
C) Metallic and cold
D) Soft and padded

What is mainly focused on in the photo?
A) A person
B) A drink
C) A tree
D) A building

What type of drink is shown in the photo?
A) A cup of coffee
B) A glass of water
C) A plastic cup with a dark beverage

What color is the surface the drink is placed on?
A) Red
B) Blue
